MemoryInfobox.description: 'According to Eppie's clue, a stele piece was hidden in the Sunken Temple of Aphrodite|temple. How could they know the sea had long since claimed that ancient place'

General_Description: '''The Tribute''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: [[Eppie]] tasked Kassandra to recover the stele piece from the coastline of [[Boeotia]].
Section_Dialogue:
Following Eppie's direction, Kassandra travelled to the [[Site of Iphigenia's Sacrifice]] to begin her search for the next stele. 

Confronting a man who was at the altar.

*'''''Tolmides:''''' ''Ugh, I hate the water. I've given up fishing. I serve the gods now.''
*'''''Kassandra:''' Fishing's worthy occupation. What caused such a change?''
*'''''Tolmides:''''' ''A sudden storm, as if the gods themselves stepped on earth. The ship keeled over and sank. Right out there! The gods saved me.''
*'''''Kassandra:''''' Did this happen after you picked up a stone relic?
*'''''Tolmides:''''' ''Well, I might have used some temple rock as a boat anchor. Nothing of value.'' 
*'''''Kassandra:''''' It's good that the gods delivered to you to safety.

She investigated coastline, finding the [[Sunken Temple of Aphrodite]]. She dived down, eliminating the [[sharks]] and looted the values in the area. In one of the chests, she recovered the stele piece along with a [[Rusty Mycenaean Helmet|helmet]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra recovered the stele piece and armor hidden in the Sunken Temple of Aphrodite.
